entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] CollectionView cell not expanding on label expanding to wrap #28454
  • `ShellContent` routes do not call `ApplyQueryAttributes` #28453
  • System.MissingMethodException: 'Method not found: void Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Internals.PropertyPropagationExtensions.PropagatePropertyChanged(string,Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Element,System.Collections.IEnumerable)' #28450
    .NET 9 SR6
  • Visual State doesn't work when GestureRecognizers is applied on CollectionView Items #28449
  • [Windows] DragGestureRecognizer's DropCompleted event is not called #28448
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Back-navigation with swipe-back navigates back twice #28446
  • [iOS] Navigation breaks when modal pages use PageSheet #28444
  • [NET 10] Move the GetBackButtonVisibleCalculated logic inside ShouldShowToolbarButton #28443
  • [Android] Handler layouting issues discovered for NumberPicker View #28442
  • FlyoutPage IsPresented not updated properly in windows #28440
  • Setting HeightRequest and WidthRequest of an ActivityIndicator, the size does not change #28439
  • MAUI WebViewer not working on MacOS even after allowing permissions to wkWebView #28438

Closed

  • Add CancellationToken to WebAuthenticator #26137
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Push Notification Icon Badge Count Not Updating when app kill or in background #28370
  • MAUI MAP control - To add new marker with icon #28436
  • Updating a ControlTemplate at runtime causes it to disappear. #15649
    Backlog
  • [MAUI]The project keeps loading when run the .NET 10 MAUI Blazor Hybrid App. #27806
    .NET 10.0-preview2
  • No Role is defined as buttons for work, personal, health, family and friends in tags section: A11y_.NET 9 template_Projects_Name Role Value. #26913
    .NET 9 SR6
  • .Net Maui projects are under Other > Custom instead of Multi-Platform #16846
    Backlog
  • maui BackgroundService #28435
  • SIGSEGV on Android 5.1.1 #28170

PullRequests

Created

  • System.MissingMethodException in PropertyPropagationExtensions fix #28456
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Recover the uitest-build task on Android cake #28452
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Upgrade Syncfusion Toolkit version from 1.0.3 to 1.0.4 #28447
    area-templates, community ✨
  • [NET10] Enable Nullability on ShellPageRendererTracker #28441
    area-controls-shell

Merged

  • Able to cancel WebAuthenticator.AuthenticateAsync programmatically using a CancellationToken #26137 #26180
    t/breaking 💥, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-webauth, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28445
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed content update issue when changing the ControlTemplate at runtime for a ContentPage #28216
    community ✨, area-controls-pages, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Accessibility] Add 'button' for TalkBalk on Android Tap Gesture Recognizers #28393
    platform/android 🤖, area-gestures, t/a11y, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on iOS/Catalyst #27971
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6

Updated

  • CollectionView display is broken when setting IsVisible after items are added - Fix #28425
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Mac Catalyst] `NullReferenceException` in `DragAndDropDelegate` - FIX #28417
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-gestures, .NET 9 SR6
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • Bring back iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation via inheritance #28434
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Essentials] Functionality to check if GPS/Location is enabled #27941
    t/enhancement ☀️, proposal/open, area-essentials, community ✨, essentials-geolocation, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Make IShape in MauiCALayer a WeakReference #28412
    area-drawing, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Testing] Fix: BlankScreenOnNavigationBack on Android #28423
    area-testing, community ✨, testing-flakiness
  • [net10.0] Trimmable view handlers #28357
    area-core-hosting
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, stale
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-controls-webview
  • Fixed SearchHandler Keyboard does not dismiss when unfocus #28186
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Draft][Accessibility] Add Accessibility Traits to CollectionView items on Android #28388
    area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] ToolbarItem Icon Color #25102
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Windows] Fixed Horizontal Spacing for Horizontal List #28311
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-gestures
  • [Android] Fix gesture crash navigating #19517
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area-gestures
  • [iOS] GraphicsView DrawString - fix #26304
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android, iOS] - Flyout icon should remain visible when a page is pushed onto a NavigationPage or Shell page with the back button disabled. #28187
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Flyout Menu Icon disappears from Window Title Bar after Navigation #28240
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enable UITest Issue18193 on MacCatalyst #28210
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 6 #28399
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Keyboard Scrolling in editors with Center or End VerticalTextAlignment #25827
    community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] ToolbarItems Tooltip text color #28427
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fixed FlyoutMenu icon issue when clearing and adding items #28241
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label text is cropped inside the border control with a specific padding value on certain Android devices #28259
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-controls-border, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Label Not Vertically Centered with MinimumHeightRequest #28270
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for border color of the RadioButton is visible in Windows #28214
    community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for RadioButton BorderColor and BorderWidth not updated at runtime #28335
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed GraphicsView drawable is visible outside the canvas #28353
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android, iOS] Dynamically setting SearchHandler Query property does not update text in the search box #28400
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix ImageButton not rendering correctly based on its bounds #28309
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] WebView Navigated event is still called even after cancelling the Navigation. #28340
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-webview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed BackButton visibility issue when switching tabs without NavigationPage #28371
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 18 #28033
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 7 #28409
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Stepper allows incrementing beyond the maximum value #28398
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android][NET 10] Fix: Ensure Image consumes touches properly #28429
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Android] RefreshView in a grid #25413
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-refreshview
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
